column6: Restored to life by the Thinker's genius and on the Thinker's terms, the Torch is now a weapon of mass destruction owned and controlled by A.I.M.  And as A.I.M.'s scientists launch him on his murderous mission, the Thinker reveals the true scope of his insane ambition! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Patrick Berkenkotter | writer:Mike Carey | letterer:Todd Klein | colorist:Alex Ross
